MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer: Welcome to write reviews for this free software

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

English.Keywords: free-icons-customization, free, SVG, ICON, Font, Web Fonts, Open Source
English.Char_Desc_45: A collection of over 33,000 free SVGs
English.Char_Desc_80: Open Source, A collection of over 33,000 free SVG icons for personal or business
English.Char_Desc_250: Open Source, Desktop version of free-icons-customization, a collection of over 33,000 high-quality free SVG icons and tools for generating customized icon font. All icons are completely free for personal or business requirements.
English.Char_Desc_450: Open Source, Desktop version of free-icons-customization, a collection of over 33,000 high-quality free SVG icons and tools for generating customized icon font. All icons are completely free for personal or business requirements. Open link: https://uuware.github.io/icons-font-customization/dist/ to view all icons. You can change colors, size for icons and download PNG / JPG / ICO / Apple ICNS image files. Available for Linux, MacOS and Windows.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Open Source, Desktop version of free-icons-customization, a collection of over 33,000 high-quality free SVG icons and tools for generating customized icon font. All icons are completely free for personal or business requirements. Open link: https://uuware.github.io/icons-font-customization/dist/ to view all icons. You can change color, background color, size for icons and can search or cache selected results, or download PNG / JPG / ICO / Apple ICNS image files directly from this link. icons-font-desktop is a desktop application, available for Linux, MacOS and Windows. Without run Node.JS / npm command, without open it in Visual Studio Code or Browser, you can easily generate your own web-fonts from selecting free SVG icons. It supports woff2, woff, ttf, eot, svg fonts, and also you can populate PNG / JPG / ICO / Apple ICNS image files.
If you want to generate fonts in your web project, or to have more alternatives about icons, fonts and suggestions, please refer to sub-project: icons-font-customization at https://github.com/uuware/icons-font-customization.
